messages.message:
Hi, I have an AI Hub customer that is having issues extracting the Rupee symbol from their documents. They are getting [?] returned instead. This seems like an OCR issue, is there anything we can do to improve this?

https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-542

@Gaurav Saini @Abhishek
Should we change to use specified language here to tackle this ?
Yes, we can set language to "en", and it will work
Would this have to be done at the platform level? Will this have an effect if people upload a japanese document for example?

Yes, this will be at platform level
No, it should not impact
